original_title: Ang Turkey Man Ay Pabo Rin
overview: A comedic film that explores the trials, tribulations and triumphs of Filipino-American couple on a universal love trip, one that does not discriminate against color, stature or culture. It is a celebration of the Filipino experience from a foreigner's perspective, and simultaneously, the realization of the American dream through a Filipino's eyes.
title: Ang Turkey Man Ay Pabo Rin
